amendment.description: Amendment sought to give affirmative defense to defendants in health care liability cases if they can show they complied with clinical practice guidelines.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 115-179 to give affirmative defense to defendants in health care liability cases if they can show they complied with clinical practice guidelines.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barr amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 116 - 310 (Roll no. 335).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Barr.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Barr amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 116 - 310 (Roll no. 335).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
